TopicTitle: Removing ship and plane files from my folder

Articles.Content: Im sure this question is as old as dirt,,,,, but help please. How in H E double hockey sticks, do you permanently remove ships and planes from my folder???   I'm using the steam version of KSP and every time I go in to my ships folder and delete the ship files, boom, they show up again when I start up my game again....   really frustrated here.   thanks in advance
